General.Name: New China Life Insurance Co Ltd
General.Description: New China Life Insurance Company Ltd. provides life insurance products and services to individuals and institutions in China. The company operates through three segments: Individual Insurance Business, Group Insurance Business, and Other Business. The company also offers asset management, training, electronic commerce, and medical services; and invests in, develops, leases, and manages real estate properties. New China Life Insurance Company Ltd. was incorporated in 1996 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.
General.Address: New China Insurance Tower, Beijing, China, 100022
